answers.answer: So sorry to hear.  Please get her to a rheumatologist.  They can properly diagnose her.

question: hello, my daugther went to school by noon she said her thumb on the left hand start swalloning for no reason wit a warm feelin like its burnin i took her to the hospital they said nothing was wrong they didnt do any test just one for her sugar to make sure she dont have diabetes. which came back ok. the next day at school it haopen again but thins tine it was a different finger. please help shes not allergic to anything i know of shes 12 years old. help
